Fault.name: BPEL/validatePaymentProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Declare the parameter in XSLT file or in the included/imported XSLT files. If the param has been declared, then change the parameter name used in the xpath function.
Fault.msg: The param "inputVariable1.paymentInfo" used in xpath function doXSLTransformForDoc cannot be found in the XSLT. If it has been declared in the included/imported XSLT files, ignore this warning.
